## X25519.sharedSecret() method

Generates a RFC6090 ECDH shared secret given the private key of one party and the public key of another party.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static sharedSecret(options: {
        privateKey: Uint8Array;
        publicKey: Uint8Array;
    }): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { privateKey: Uint8Array; publicKey: Uint8Array; } | The options for the shared secret computation operation. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

A Promise that resolves to the computed shared secret as a Uint8Array.
